participant_1.background:
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.
i like football on tv.
My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.
i have been married for five years.

participant_2.background:
I got lost in Tokyo and a kind stranger helped me find my way back to my hotel.
i do not like broccoli.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.
i like early 2000s indie music.
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.

content.text: Hi there!  How are you today?
Hey! I'm doing well, thank you! How are you?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking!  What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy listening to early 2000s indie music, eating cheeseburgers, and doing laundry on the weekends.
I like cheeseburgers too!  But I'm more of a football fan.  What are some of your favorite albums from the early 2000s?
I really like the album "The Moon & Antarctica" by Modest Mouse.  What's your favorite football team?
I'm a fan of the Green Bay Packers.  My best friend died in a car accident in college, and the Packers were his favorite team.  I've been a fan ever since.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  I'm sure he would be proud of you for keeping his memory alive.
Thank you.  I try to honor his memory every day.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a personal trainer.  I help people get healthy and fit.
That sounds like a rewarding job.
It is.  I love helping people reach their goals.
